name: Super Hippie Marathon Man: New York Edition
name_original: Super Hippie Marathon Man: New York Edition
description:
The project is an "endless runner" 2D scheduled on PC and tells the story of a runner, Bob Poztakich at the first marathon in New York in the 70s. 

This period is known for experimenting with multiple drugs. And I specify that because sometimes there is a guy, not a hero, what is a hero? ...

As you can see, Bob must take a max drug to win this marathon but beware of overdose, it will manage its use under threat of penalty
